name: gatsby-grommet-cordova-starter
description: A template of a Gatsby/Grommet/Cordova starter project
author: Dwlt Kvn

scripts.initCordova: cordova create cordova && pushd cordova && cordova platform add android
scripts.pluginCordova: pushd cordova && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-inappbrowser && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-httpd
scripts.copyCordova: rmdir /S /Q .\cordova\www\ && pause && mkdir .\cordova\www\ && pause && mkdir .\cordova\www\public\ && pause && copy .\cordova.html .\cordova\www\index.html && pause && copy .\public .\cordova\www\public\
